New Records: Timberwolves guard Anthony Edwards dropped a career-high 53 points and made a personal-best 10 three-pointers in the game.
Key Match Events: Edwards scored a layup with 22.1 seconds left to reach the milestone and the Pistons led by as much as 24 points.
Post-Match Reflections: The Timberwolves have now lost their last three games and six of their previous 10 to drop their record to 17-17 on the season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cade Cunningham led Detroit with 40 points, and Malik Beasley added 23 points off the bench.
